description.value:
You've created an extradimensional storage in the depths of your mind. This storage can hold a maximum Bulk and a maximum number of items equal to your level; the Bulk of items inside this storage is not counted against your maximum.

You can manifest a portal to your personal storage in your square as a 3-action activity with the concentrate trait. As part of this action, you may draw or stow one item from or to your personal storage. This storage remains open until the end of your next turn, though you can Dismiss it as an action.

Creatures in or adjacent to your square can attempt Thievery checks to Steal from your personal storage while it is open, provided they believe or know the item they're after is inside.

Foundry note Manually update the bulk capacity and bulk ignored of the secret stash as you level.
